activities: Infotrieve is a web-based software-as-a-service platform to search for, order, and organize scientic, technical, and medical literature.  In performing the services on behalf of Infotrieve collects and making the webpage accessible to users, Infotrieve collects names, addresses, e-mails, and phone numbers, certain billing information, order data, and certain other information regarding the access and use of the platform.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
